title: Distributive Property Explanation
text: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of the sum or difference by that number.
speech: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of the sum or difference by that number.
pacedSpeech: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of the sum or difference by that number.

title: Splitting Sums

into its individual terms, to use the distributive property with.
